ModMetaData.name: ED-More Vanilla Turrets
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa, Original by: Marnador
ModMetaData.description:
Based on the Original "More Vanilla Turrets" by Marnador. Original: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=9521.0
This is a mod that adds more turret variations with the attempt to keep their vanilla art style.
Currently this is almost exactly the same as the A12 version by Marnador.
